i was a member for one month , i found 1x the xp too slow.[/quote]
That’s how it has been and always will be lol.

Jagex is a business, not a free babysitting service for a bunch of twelve year old brats.
[/quote]

THIS^ , And it was never going to be open for free players , if you want to play just pay like the rest of us did

i was always a memeber in 2006 i never played free player bullshit[/quote]

item.title: When is RS07 for non-members?
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:8, topic:518335”]I agree that they have to get money for their servers.
But to be honest i dont think its fair.

You needed to be a member to vote.
If it a free vote i’m sure there were like 1m votes.

(For example i didnt buy member to vote, but 1.5 month after the release i found out it was pretty cool so i bought membership)
I think there are alot ppl like me, that didnt want to buy membership for the vote.[/quote]

yeah but theres no reason for them to take f2p votes as they obviously arent making the company money

Read full topic

item.title: When is RS07 for non-members?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:8, topic:518335”]I agree that they have to get money for their servers.
But to be honest i dont think its fair.

You needed to be a member to vote.
If it a free vote i’m sure there were like 1m votes.

(For example i didnt buy member to vote, but 1.5 month after the release i found out it was pretty cool so i bought membership)
I think there are alot ppl like me, that didnt want to buy membership for the vote.[/quote]

Of course there would be > 1,000,000 votes if the vote were free. If every person who voted made 2 more accounts and voted again, it’s an instant achievement. It was a business strategy as well, and it worked. Membership is $8 and OSRS was guaranteed to at least be released, it’s not that big of a deal. They’ll probably make numerous changes on how they manage it in the future, I doubt that poll is set in stone.

Read full topic

item.title: When is RS07 for non-members?
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

killerjens9:

i didnt want to buy membership for voting and in sweden you can’t buy membership from your phone if you don’t have an android so you can’t buy membership with windowphone or older because they maked some shit named wywallet so we need to register and wait…

Do you have a wal-mart where you live in sweden? Go to the wall-mart and buy membership cards or go to the runescape website and go to membership, it should also show you the available retailers in your country that sell them.
